name: k6-script-from-har
description: k6 script from har - dead simple k6 test generator

scripts.postinstall: node -e "if (process.env.INIT_CWD === process.cwd()) process.exit(); const fs = require('node:fs'); const dest = process.env.INIT_CWD; fs.readdirSync('src').forEach(file => { try { fs.copyFileSync('src/' + file, dest + '/' + file, fs.constants.COPYFILE_EXCL); } catch(e) { if (e.code !== 'EEXIST') throw e; } });"

author: DNV
